page.title: 12Modern Children's Games
page.content: Apart from the usual games of skipping,football,hopscotch etc.,there are always more new games evolving. Some are brand new,some merely variations of old. { } {PAC-MAN}uses the lines found in any playground and the general principles of the computer game.The inventor,"Biff" Smith,says that it is like "He",but you can only run on the lines. { SEVENSIES}is a ball game involving 7 tasks of rebounding a ball against a wall.The first task is performed 7 times,the next 6,then 5 and so on.Each new task is more difficult than the previous.{ } {WUNEE-AWLEE} or{ONE-HE,ALL-HE}is basically "He", but when "Had" you stay "It" until everbody is "It".
